接口 RecipeMapper

public interface RecipeMapper
MyBatis mapper interface for Recipe entity operations. This interface defines database operations for managing recipes including CRUD operations, search functionality, and recipe retrieval methods.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    boolean
    addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
    Adds a new recipe to the database.
    boolean
    deleteRecipe(Integer recipeID)
    Deletes a recipe from the database.
    ArrayList<Recipe>
    getAllRecipes()
    Retrieves all recipes from the database.
    Recipe

    Retrieves the most recently added recipe.

    Retrieves recipes by category.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addRecipe

      boolean addRecipe(@Param("recipe") Recipe recipe)
      Adds a new recipe to the database.
      参数:
      recipe - the Recipe object to be added
      返回:
      true if the addition was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteRecipe

      boolean deleteRecipe(@Param("recipeID") Integer recipeID)
      Deletes a recipe from the database. This will also cascade delete related ingredients and preparation steps.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe to be deleted
      返回:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • updateRecipe

      boolean updateRecipe(@Param("recipe") Recipe recipe)
      Updates an existing recipe in the database.
      参数:
      recipe - the Recipe object with updated information
      返回:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • getRecipeById

      Recipe getRecipeById(@Param("recipeId") int recipeId)
      Retrieves a recipe by its unique ID.
      参数:
      recipeId - the unique identifier of the recipe
      返回:
      the Recipe object if found, null otherwise

    • getNewRecipe

      Recipe getNewRecipe()
      Retrieves the most recently added recipe. This method is typically used after adding a new recipe to get its generated ID.
      返回:
      the most recently added Recipe object

    • getRecipeByName

      ArrayList<Recipe> getRecipeByName(@Param("recipeName") String recipeName)
      Searches for recipes by name. This method performs a search that may include partial name matches.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name or partial name to search for
      返回:
      a list of Recipe objects matching the search criteria

    • getAllRecipes

      ArrayList<Recipe> getAllRecipes()
      Retrieves all recipes from the database.
      返回:
      a list of all Recipe objects in the database

    • getRecipeByCategory

      ArrayList<Recipe> getRecipeByCategory(@Param("category") String category)
      Retrieves recipes by category.
      参数:
      category - the category to filter recipes by
      返回:
      a list of Recipe objects in the specified category
